title: Old Portfolio
description: In the past I've made many unfinished portfolios. That's one of them,
but it's the closest one to being considered finished from all of them.
You can check it out by click the button next to the project title.

title: Minecraft 1
description: A basic template for a minecraft server website.
In the future I will make more templates that are more advanced.
You can download it from my github.
